text: Who Was That Lady? is a 1960 American spy comedy movie directed by George Sidney and was based on the 1958 play of the same name. It stars Tony Curtis, Janet Leigh, Dean Martin, Jack Benny, James Whitmore, Larry Keating, Larry Storch. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 comedy movies Category:1960s spy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Sidney Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Who Was That Lady?
